channel.title: AltServer Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.6.1
item.description: • Supports Apple IDs with Advanced Data Protection (ADP) enabled

item.title: Version 1.6
item.description:
New
  • Completely revamped error handling to include as much information as possible, which should make debugging certain issues much easier
  • Revised error messages to be more descriptive and provide more suggestions
  • Updated error messages to match AltServer macOS
  • “Help” button on error alerts to view detailed error information
  • Search for error code directly in AltStore FAQ
  • Checks iOS compatibility before installing AltStore and downloads latest compatible version
    Fixed
  • Fixed AltServer notification icon not appearing in Windows 11 22H2 taskbar
  • Fixed error encoding CodableError Int/UInt user info values

item.title: Version 1.5.1
item.description:
This update fixes the following issues:
  • Using Apple IDs that contain capital letters
  • Using Apple IDs that have 2FA enabled without any trusted devices
  • Incorrect “Developer Disk incompatible with [iOS Version]” error when enabling AltJIT
  • Indefinite high CPU usage after enabling AltJIT
  • Indefinite high CPU usage after updating AltStore

item.title: Version 1.5
item.description:
New
  • Enable Just-in-Time (JIT) compilation for sideloaded apps with new "Enable JIT" menu option
  • Sideload apps (.ipa's) directly to iOS devices without installing AltStore first*
  • Install AltStore onto multiple iOS devices using the same Apple ID
    Improved
  • Prefers “Individual” paid teams over free teams if there are multiple Apple Developer teams associated with your Apple ID
  • Revokes the previous iOS Development certificate created by AltStore (if one exists) instead of revoking a random one
  • Improved various error messages
    Fixed
  • Fixed “App Group does not exist” error when sideloading apps
  • Fixed a potential crash when disconnecting an iOS device from your computer
  • Fixed a potential crash when sideloading certain apps
  • Fixed potentially registering an app group twice when sideloading an app containing app extensions
  • Fixed issue unzipping .ipa’s with unexpected files in Payload directory
  • Fixed ignoring some error responses from Apple’s developer servers
  • Fixed memory leak when parsing responses from Apple’s developer servers
  • Fixed various memory leaks when managing a device’s provisioning profiles
  • Fixed various memory leaks when installing AltStore or sideloading .ipa’s
*Hold Shift when clicking AltServer icon to make the "Sideload .ipa" menu option appear

item.title: Version 1.4.6
item.description:
• Fixes "unsupported code signature version" error on iOS 15
  • Improves reliability when handling AltStore requests

item.title: Version 1.4.4
item.description: • Fixes installing AltStore onto devices running iOS 14.5

item.title: Version 1.4.3
item.description:
• Fixes apps installed after January 28 crashing on launch*
* Requires manually updating AltStore by reinstalling with this AltServer version. You do not need to delete AltStore first.

item.title: Version 1.4.1
item.description:
New
  • Fixes AltStore crashing on iOS 14.2 beta.*
    Previous Update
  • Improves support for devices running iOS 14 or later.
* If you have already updated to 14.2, you can manually update AltStore by reinstalling with this AltServer version. You do not need to delete the app first.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description: • Improves support for devices running iOS 14 or later.

item.title: Version 1.3.2
item.description:
• Manually locate iTunes and iCloud directories if they cannot be found by AltServer.
  • Fixes "Not a Number" error.
  • Fixes -29004 "Environment Mismatch" error.
  • Fixes potential crash when an error occurs between AltStore and AltServer.
  • Improves error messages for several common issues.

item.title: Version 1.3.1
item.description: • Adds support for deactivating apps with AltStore 1.3.4.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
• Dramatically faster app refresh times.
  • Support for (de-)activating apps on iOS 13.3.1 and later (requires AltStore 1.3).
  • Improved error messages for common issues.
  • Fixes occasional crash when handling AltStore requests.

item.title: Version 1.2.2
item.description:
• Fixes -22421 error when installing AltStore.
  • Fixes occasional crash after connecting a device via USB.

Previous Updates:
  • Install AltStore to your phone over WiFi, not just via USB.
  • Refresh your apps over USB, not just over WiFi (requires updating to latest AltStore version).
  • Fixes “3 App Limit Reached” error.
  • Fixes "Session Expired" error when installing AltStore on a slow connection.
  • Fixes "iTunes or iCloud not installed" error on Windows 10 32-bit.
  • Fixes "Unable to get debs" error when using unc0ver jailbreak.

item.title: Version 1.2.1
item.description:
• Fixes "iTunes or iCloud not installed" error on Windows 10 32-bit.
  • Fixes "Unable to get debs" error when using unc0ver jailbreak.

Previous Update:
  • Install AltStore to your phone over WiFi, not just via USB.
  • Refresh your apps over USB, not just over WiFi (requires updating to latest AltStore version).
  • Fixes “3 App Limit Reached” error.
  • Fixes "Session Expired" error when installing AltStore on a slow connection.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
• Install AltStore to your phone over WiFi, not just via USB.
  • Refresh your apps over USB, not just over WiFi (requires updating to latest AltStore version).
  • Fixes “3 App Limit Reached” error.
  • Fixes "Session Expired" error when installing AltStore on a slow connection.

item.title: Version 1.1.2
item.description:
• Fixes “Session Expired" error when installing/refreshing apps.
  • Fixes "not a number" error when installing AltStore.
  • Improves support for Apple IDs with two-factor authentication enabled.

item.title: Version 1.1.1
item.description:
• Fixes “Update to Xcode 7.3 or later” error message.
  • Checks for updates automatically.
